alert.note: Alert for Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:20AM CST until January 27 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River Near East Bernard affecting Colorado, Wharton, Fort Bend and Austin Counties. San Bernard River near Boling affecting Wharton, Fort Bend and Brazoria Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River near Sweeny affecting Brazoria County. For the San Bernard River...including East Bernard, Sweeny, Boling... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Bernard River near Sweeny. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Lazy G RV Park becomes threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Thursday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.7 feet on 12/09/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun San Bernard River Sweeny 7.0 11.1 Thu 10 am CS 10.8 6.8 5.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening.late tonight at 430 AM CST.
